settings.title: Our Initiatives save critically endangered wildlife from habitat loss & poaching.

settings.editor: Our mission is to secure a future for elephants and to sustain the beauty and ecological integrity of the places they live; to promote man’s delight in their intelligence and the diversity of their world, and to develop a tolerant relationship between the two.
